Package Ex1

Interface Polynom_able

  • All Superinterfaces:
    cont_function, function, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Polynom
    public interface Polynom_able
extends cont_function
    This interface represents a general Polynom: f(x) = a_1X^b_1 + a_2*X^b_2 ... a_n*Xb_n, where: a_1, a_2 ... a_n are real numbers and b_1
    Author:
    ben-moshe
